positions.title: Software Development Engineer
positions.description:

positions.title: Software Development Engineer

QA and Playtesting on various upcoming Xbox One titles

positions.title: Software Development Engineer

Proof-of-Concept for message queue's usability and responsiveness versus rapid server polling
Eliminated rapid-server-polling and replace with message queue-based notification system
